title: Torat HaBayit HaAroch
enDesc: Written by the Rashba (Rabbi Shlomo ben Avraham ibn Aderet), Torat HaBayit HaAroch is a compendium of laws related to the home, including kashrut laws. The abridged version is called Torat HaBayit HaKatzar.

titles.text: The Seventh House, The Women's House

nodes.title: The Seventh House, The Women's House
